about_the_game:
Wake up in an unfamiliar world full of monsters to catch and battle. 

Tinymon RPG is a new take on the classic monster-taming genre, featuring simple but charming graphics, familiar but fresh battles, and a new world to explore to collect both the Tinymon inhabitants and language learning cards that have been lost.

Where have you awoken? Travel through the land of Tinymon, battling your way to the top on a journey full of questions you hope to answer. Learn a new language through the flashcard system, the professor's cards have been lost and scattered around the island. Even though you are a new (and confused) resident, it's up to you to find them. Find out where and how you arrived to this new world through a story with unexpected twists.

*Language learning aspects are toggleable and therefore completely optional

Tinymon RPG features in-world, turn based battles. Run into a challenger, and battle right in the environment you found them in. Simple, but refreshing. Customize what parts of the HUD are in English and Japanese, whether you want to play in full English and ignore all language learning features, or mix it up and have a little of both. It's up to you to choose the experience that fits you best.

Language learning? Tinymon RPG features both English and Japanese simultaneously. All dialogue and text within the game can be customized to your liking. Tinymon RPG is a dual language game if you want it to be, showing every bit of text in the game in 2 languages at once. With the collectible flashcard system, you will learn new words and phrases on your journey through this Isekai inspired world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 8th Gen Intel i3 or similar
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 10th Gen Intel i3 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Delve into an isekai world full of tiny monsters ready to battle, learn a new language on the way, and explore the land of Tinymon! A refreshing but retro take on the monster-taming genre.
